lead_paragraph: Justine Henin-Hardenne may be sidelined until the women’s tour season-ending event in November because of a knee injury that forced her to quit during the decisive match of the Fed Cup final between Belgium and Italy on Sunday.
snippet: Justine Henin-Hardenne may be sidelined until the women’s tour season-ending event in November because of a knee injury that forced her to quit during the decisive match of the Fed Cup final between Belgium and Italy on Sunday.
